attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!
attributes.review: President Trump is an evil man who is in it for himself. He is a wining baby that fires anyone he disagrees with. He is sending America back in a time machine back to times of inequality and hatred everywhere. We must stop him. I believe that joe Biden can win this election and bring America back to what it once was. The land of opportunity. Equality. And justice for all!! #Biden2020🇺🇸

attributes.title: Bad Design
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to receive news about the 2020 campaign, but the app was almost impossible to use. It kept crashing and everything took very long to load. Furthermore, the app’s design is atrocious. It was hard to navigate and much too cluttered.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: I wanted to see what the Trump 2020 Campaign had to offer, but ever since downloading this app, my phones battery has been crashing, none of my other apps work, and it keeps playing music even when the app is closed. Very disappointing.

attributes.title: Not it.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to learn more about trump and what his plans were and how he was going to make America great again, what I got was much different. Scam scam scam, constantly asking for money, the minimum being 40 dollars. If you wanna pour your money to him then I guess this app is for you

attributes.title: ✨would not recommend ✨
attributes.review: I got this app to follow our wonderful 🍊of a president. However, when it finally downloaded after many, many hours, the app wouldn’t open. What a shame. As the president of the Divided States of America should at least have a working app. Smh 🤦‍♀️

attributes.title: Spam💔
attributes.review:
Heart been broke💔 so many times⏰ I don’t know what to believe 🤔💯 Mama 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 said 🗣it was my fault 😢 it was my fault 🤦🏻‍♀️ I wear my heart❤️ on my sleeve 💪🏼 I think its best 👍🏼 to put my heart ❤️ on ice 🧊 

Anyways, I keep getting repeated text messages from the 🍊 & I really don’t like them. This is a big issue. The texts wake me from my slumber 💤

attributes.title: terrible app i absolutely hate it
attributes.review: ABSOLUTE TRASHHHH!!! this app has so many glitches i’m surprised the app store hasn’t taken it down yet! It constantly kicks me out of the app, and messages pop up on the screen with horrible things like “kill yourself” or “bernie 2020”! if i could put 0 stars i would

attributes.title: It’s so stinky!!
attributes.review: It is so racist and just pee you!! I highly recommend NOT get it it’s so unprofessional and I can’t believe it’s even a thing. I thought it would give more insight on his ideas, or his good ones, but it didn’t! It was just spam and terrible 💩🤡🤢🤮 I do NOT like this nor would I ever recommend it.

attributes.title: horrible 😹❤️
attributes.review: unfortunately this app took HOURS to load. i was SO excited to see what the orange himself was planning without country. when i opened the app, i was greeted by the cheeto himself saying “white lives matter” which is a BIG OLE RACIST MOVE. then, a t. rex came alive and went to my house and STEPPED ON MY MOM. gonna have to leave a 1 star 😞

attributes.title: Ban trump
attributes.review: I’m doing this for the gen-z thing and for his banning tik tok. So ima leave the worst review I can think of. I rly don’t appreciate what trump has done for this country he has done nothing but made it worse I think we all want and need a new and better president please I pray to have a whole new different president.
